casebody.data:
HODGSON CONSTRUCTION
v.
HOWARD. No. 5P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 8, 2008. Daniel Johnson, for Hodgson Construction.

*664Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 654 S.E.2d 7.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of January 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of January 2008."
